page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE IN ST.AGNES
page.content: MY NAME IS AMANDA AND I AM 8 YEARS OLD. IN THE MORNING I GET UP AND HAVE BREAKFAST .THEN I GO INTO THE GARDEN AND WALK IN THE GREENHOUSE AND SEE THE DUCKS. MUM SAYS," COMING WITH ME TO WATER THE BULLOCKS?" I SAY,"YES" AND WE GO AND SEE THEM AND SAY HELLO TO BLACKIE THE HORSE.I LIKE HORSE RIDING SO IN THE AFTERNOON I RIDE HIM. AFTER THAT I HAVE TEA. SOMETIMES WE HAVE SANDWICHES OR A COOKED MEAL, NORMALLY A COOKED MEAL. THEN I GO OUT AND PLAY. SOON IT IS TIME FOR MY SISTER EMMA TO GO TO BED AND I GO WITH DADDY TO SEE THE BULLOCKS, LITTLE CHICKS AND BLACKIE. THEN I GO TO BED AS WELL.
